blips.content: Kobato. 13 - spojrzenie typu "nikt mnie nie rozumie" numer 5
Kobato. 16 - #blipotele: jakie zwierzę symbolizuje ta maskotka?
Kobato. 17 - z Ioryogiego byłby świetny wykładowca, ma dobre podejście do studenta
Kobato. 18 - coraz bliżej święta, coraz bli- a nie, źle.
Kobato. 20 - fakt, że to #anime jest na podstawie mangi stworzonej przez CLAMP prowadzi niekiedy do takich sytuacji...
Kobato. 21 - wyobraźcie sobie mieć ją za dziewczynę: nie dość, że ładna, to ile kasy można by zaoszczędzić na jedzeniu!
Kobato. 22 - pytanie natury filozoficznej: jak taka mała kopareczka może w ciągu jednego dnia zniszczyć wcale spore przedszkole Yomogi?
#anime #Jesień2009 Kobato. (こばと。) - nasza ocena: ujdzie w tłoku (więcej: http://rdir.pl/81aa6)

plots.content: Młode dziewczę pracujące w przedszkolu leczy ludzkie serca i zbiera konfetti do butelki, aby spełnić swoje marzenie.

* Based on Clamp's seinen manga currently serialised in Newtype and formerly in Monthly Sunday Gene-X.Kobato is a sweet and perky girl, but also extremely naive about the world around her, since she literally fell out of the sky, and thus unaccustomed to the human world. She is on a "mission" to fill a mysterious flask with "heart fragments" gained by healing people's broken hearts. Once filled, her wish to visit a certain place will be granted. However, she must not fall in love with a particular boy she works with and whose heart she must heal.

Sweet and naïve Hanato Kobato came to Earth on a mission to collect and fill a bottle with 'konpeito,' which appear after healing a person's heart that is suffering. Kobato collects these because it is her wish to go to a certain place. Despite her strangeness, Kobato turns out to be well-suited for this mission as her heartfelt sincerity in helping others earns her the love and admiration of everyone she meets. However, she is not allowed to fall in love with anyone whose heart she heals.    [Written by MAL Rewrite]

Kobato is a girl who came to earth to fulfill her wish, which is to go to a certain place. To fulfill that wish, she has to find a bottle and fill it wich scarred hearts. Together with her "teacher", which is a stuffed animal, she search for the scarred hearts. However she may not fall in love with any person whom she cures the heart of.
